post.body: have u chatted w/ the usual suspects i.e. Conduit, Dynamic Toolbar? i have some other ideas if u want to connect re: ur toolbar
i'm giving tr.im a try as well. i use budurl.com as it provides analytics, but always up for conserving 6 characters
how do i unsubscribe from your emails? didn't see an easy option in the email or on ur site. thx
i don't see a link on the right to a new Veoh.com? i did think for a sec i went to Nikon.com by accident :-)
i'm frustrated by the lack of pho in downtown. thinking of starting a petition.
happy birthday big bro!
i guess i was already assuming the focus is & has been on Wall St for the past year (i.e. the Stage6 shutdown)
i'm surprised DivX only cut 21 (if @TechCrunch is accurate). with the Yahoo situation, figured more would have to go.
no cons from my perspective except for a sore arm. last several years i've gotten a flu shot, worked like a charm.
fyi she's @thiennguyen :-)
as long as espn loses the auto-play of their videos & stops pumping pre-roll impressions at me, i'll be happy.
romanians love the candy!
have you tried pingg? i've only as a guest & not an organizer but seemed decently slick.
our fault for not spending our hard-earned VC $ on replacing them. thought we were good after removing the dead spiders & bees!
long time since u were at Lcast & i at DivX. r u still at Brightroll? (tod called me a yr ago for refrnce dirt ;) we shld catch up
>1/2 of us r on Macs so we've avoided Exchange. lmk if you find a solution to ur frustrations. oh & add Thunderbird 2 the list of suck
10News link on search for armed man at Helix High School in La Mesa http://tr.im/2crx
rt @chrisabad Holy crap! Unconfirmed reports a gunman has opened fire on the Helix High School campus (La Mesa, CA)
OpenCandy is hiring: partner support engr, server engr, sr. client software engr, sr. whitebox qa engr, sys admin, prog mgr. job recs coming
what r the best sites besides dice to post technical job recs these days?
just chatted w/ @tobiaspeggs of OneRiot (fmr Me.dium). the world of browser add-ons is very relevant to OpenCandy. i shldve gone 2 #addoncon
Twitter was made for bored moments at ur sig others holiday party
just chatted with Soujanya, CEO of @CoolirisTeam. fan of Cooliris products; organic growth (>10M installs) has been impressive.
rt @jasonnazar FREE: 10 Documents You MUST Have to Start a Company - http://tinyurl.com/63ksvq. good stuff j, passing along.
in the last 24 hours: 2 new partners signed, 1 new hire made. must've been inspired by lunch w/ fmr boss @geisoray (now Dash SVP Biz Dev)
dear #DivX friends- today can't be fun but hang in there for the "onwards/upwards" (its worth it, trust me). if i can help ie my network lmk
Merry Christmas all!
my Christmas spam musubi was a hit, as was the usual bacon pineapple shrimp from uncle. another fun eve party, gets more crowded every year!
Heading up to LA for family Christmas eve party with @elliottng @puhfu etc
thinking about what i and we really need to improve on in the new year
was ecstatic by the email silence over the wknd but it was because we were transitioning from fusemail to gmail. now facing my inbox.
wow. #chargers. wow
My once-every-2-month blog post: "I never knew how much I needed these 3 apps until I opened and started using them" http://tr.im/2hij
OH i've never seen a hooters girl pick her nose so much in front of customers! its friday, forgive the quality of my tweets.
http://twitpic.com/uaq6 - At Hooters with @Darrius & Joe Lin. They now have all u can eat wings on Tues. I'm in trouble.
already had 1 foot on the Brandon Roy bandwagon & now just swung the rest of my body in. haven't seen an #NBA player that smooth in a while
http://twitpic.com/u1vw - Resurrected our overheated server with an office depot fan & cardboard. I retract that prev comment abt office ...
office started to feel "real" after adding a toaster oven & humanscale chairs (that kick aeron ass) until our hand-me-down server overheated
today marks an important 1-year anniversary for ZG #Stage6 peeps. buy a "I'm Over It" shirt, mug, or thong in remembrance. http://tr.im/2epo
entrepreneurs r spending too much time today thinking abt what to do re: @TechCrunch embargo drama instead of focusing on their start-up
